accessorKey.description: Key to access data in the row object

accessorFn.description: Function to access data from the row

header.description: Header text displayed in the column header

column_title.description: Display title for the column in UI and exports

description.description: Tooltip description for the column header

data_type.description: Data type of the column values

size.description: Default size/width of the column in pixels

hidden.description: Whether the column is hidden by default

sticky.description: Whether the column should stick to the left side when scrolling horizontally

sortType.description: Sorting algorithm to use for this column

fixed.description: Number of decimal places to display for numeric values

reverse_percentiles.description: Whether to reverse the percentile coloring (lower values = better)

operators.description: Available filter operators for this column

column_params.description: Parameters that can be configured for this column

column_values.description: Available values for SELECT type columns and filter dropdowns

component.description: React component to render for cells in this column

is_split.description: Whether this is a split column

prefix.description: Whether this is a prefix column

column_index.description: Index position for duplicate column IDs

is_sortable.description: Whether this column can be sorted
